sentence.Network_en: They rolled about on the Gilligan Road, simulating a bloodthirsty fight.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们在吉利根路上翻滚，模拟一场暴力厮杀。

sentence.Network_en: They expected to find a bloodthirsty man, happy in his revenge.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们本来以为他们找到的是一个嗜血鬼, 一个渴望报仇的人.

entry.tran: 嗜杀成性的；耽于暴力的；残忍的；血腥的
entry.def: Bloodthirsty people are eager to use violence or display a strong interest in violent things. You can also use bloodthirsty to refer to very violent situations.

example.ex: ...some of the most tragic scenes witnessed even in this bloodthirsty war.
example.tran: 在这场血腥的战争中一些最令人惨不忍睹的场景

means.word_mean: 1. marked by eagerness to resort to violence and bloodshed;

sentences.sentence: "went after the collaborators with a sanguinary fury that drenched the land with blood"-G.W.Johnson
